I was wondering if anyone has a good suggestion to accomplish this 
goal.

=
I'd like to have some of my automated integration tests to run 
multiple ti=
mes, against various databases.  This way I can make sure 
different databa=
ses (oracle, mssql, etc) don't exhibit different 
behaviour.

Effectively, =
I'd like my unit tests to run multiple times with a 
little hook in between=
 for me to setup my hibernate configuration (to 
point it at each database)=
.

I'd prefer not to tweak anything in Ant because I'm using Netbeans 
gene=
rated ant scripts and, well quite frankly, changing them scares me.

I don'=
t mind having a little code in my tests if needed, like setting 
up a speci=
al suite or something.

Any suggestions?
